attributes.action: Endorse the need for Spam fritters to be reintroduced as a vital component of the diet of schoolchildren
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Never fussy, sometimes crispy though sometimes soggy, Spam fritters were once vital part of every school-dinner-suffering-child's diet. However, over the last 20 years said fritters have almost utterly disappeared from the diet of out nation's children.

Now is the time to revive a vital old habit and give our youngsters the chance not only to reinvigorate their eating habits, but also to flick chunky bits of batter at Mr Gobbins the Maths oligarch.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
